text: Vin Diesel (born Mark Sinclair Vincent; July 18, 1967) is an American actor, director, producer and screenwriter. He is known for his roles in the movies The Fast and the Furious series, The Chronicles of Riddick trilogy, the voice of Groot in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and in XXX. Diesel was born in Alameda County, California. He studied at Hunter College. He is partners with Paloma Jimenez. His father is African-American and his mother is of English, German, Irish and Scottish descent. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Alameda County, California Category:Actors from New York City Category:African- American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City
title: Vin Diesel
